title: Free Game of Day label should be supported for a game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is designated as Free Game of the Day
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB and a game is FGOD
custom_expected: THEN the game that is designated as FGOD, should have the Free Game of the Day label

title: Game Alerts should be supported for a game (Perfect Game/No Hitter)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is in a Perfect Game or No Hitter situation
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB with game alert situation
custom_expected: THEN depending on the circumstance, either the Perfect Game or No Hitter banner should appear on the game cell and be clickable (links to gameday)

title: Live Look-In banner should be supported??
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game is designated as Live Look In
custom_steps: WHEN user views the miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the game that is designated as Live Look In (LLI), AND would have the ability to link to view a video of game

title: Product Icons - Pregame (Preview, MiLB.TV, Tickets)
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is in Preview game state
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB with game in Preview game state
custom_expected:
THEN game in Preview should have up to 3 Product Icons
1. Preview (Gameday icon > links to Gameday preview mode with matchups and lineups)
2. MiLB.TV (MiLB.TV icon > links to video page) **only appears if media is available
3. Tickets (Tickets icon > links to home team tickets page)

title: Product Icons - Live (Gameday, MiLB.TV)
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is in a Live game state
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB with Live games
custom_expected:
THEN up to 2 Product Icons should appear
1. Gameday icon > links to live Gameday state
2. MiLB.TV icon > links to MiLB.TV page **only appear if Media is available

title: Product Icons - Final/Post (Box, MiLB.TV)
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is in Final (Postgame) state
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB with games in Final state
custom_expected:
THEN up to 2 Product Links should appear
1. Box Score (Gameday Icon)
2. MiLB.TV > links to MiLB media archive **only if media is available

title: Class Picker dropdown is Present
custom_preconds: GIVEN User viewport size is in XL, L, or M viewport
custom_steps: WHEN user loads milb.com
custom_expected: Class Picker dropdown should appear to the left of miniSB

title: Class Picker dropdown is able to be opened
custom_preconds: GIVEN User viewport size is in XL, L, or M viewport
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Class Picker dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN 
1. the dropdown should open
2. should show list of MiLB classes: Triple A, Double A, Class A Advanced (Class A Adv.), Class A, Class A Short Season (Class A Short), Rookie
3. should show a list of MLB team affiliates (30 teams) below the MiLB classes

title: Class Picker dropdown items can be selected
custom_preconds: GIVEN User viewport size is in XL, L, or M viewport
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a dropdown item
custom_expected: THEN selected item should appear selected within dropdown

title: Class Picker selected item filters out miniSB data
custom_preconds: GIVEN user viewports are in XL, L, or M
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an item from dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the miniSB should filter out to show relevant games to the selected item
Example for Class: if user selects double A, then only double A games should appear
Example for Team: if user selects New York Yankees, then only New York Yankees minor league affiliated games should appear

title: Class Picker dropdown on milb.com defaults to Triple A (AAA)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views milb.com in XL, L, M viewports
custom_steps: WHEN user loads the milb.com homepage
custom_expected: THEN the Class Picker should default to Triple A (AAA)

title: Class Picker dropdown does not appear on League Pages
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views League pages on XL, L, or M viewports
custom_steps: WHEN user views League pages (ie: NWL)
custom_expected: THEN the Class Picker should NOT appear on page

title: Class Picker should default to a League with games if AAA has off-day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user views milb.com on XL, L, M viewport size 
AND
AAA has a day off and does not have any scheduled games (pre/post asg)
custom_steps: WHEN user loads milb.com when AAA does not have Scheduled games
custom_expected: THEN Class Picker and miniSB should default to AA

title: Handling for AAA off day
custom_preconds: GIVEN AAA has an off day (pre & post ASG)
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB on MiLB.com
custom_expected: THEN the miniSB should default to Double A scores and games

title: Handling for League off day
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views miniSB League page, on a League off day
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB League page, on a League off day
custom_expected: THEN League miniSBs should show the next day that has a scheduled game

title: Handling for ASG
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views milb.com miniSB on day of ASG
custom_steps: WHEN user views milb miniSB on day of ASG
custom_expected: THEN miniSB should only show the ASG on miniSB

title: miniSB displays all games for selected date
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the miniSB should load all games for the current day

title: miniSB flips to next day at 10AM
custom_preconds: GIVEN user views miniSB at 10am ET
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB
custom_expected:
THEN the miniSB should show current day's games after 10am ET flip
IF before 10amET, then miniSB should show previous days games

title: Teams - Team logos appear next to tri-code
custom_preconds: GIVEN user loads page in XL, L, M viewports
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the team logo should appear next to the team tri-code (to left of tri-code)

title: Game-type - Spring Training label is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN MiLB is in Spring Training
custom_steps: WHEN user views game cell on miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the game cell should show Spring Training label

title: Game-type - Exhibition label is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN MiLB has an Exhibition game
custom_steps: WHEN user views game cell on miniSB
custom_expected: THEN Exhibition label should appear on game cell

title: Event type - Home Opener label is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN team has a home opener
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB
custom_expected: THEN game cell should have a Home Opener label

title: miniSB Header - shows current day of week
custom_preconds: GIVEN miniSB module is up
custom_steps: WHEN user loads MLB.com and views miniSB
custom_expected: THEN miniSB header should read the current day of week (SUN, MON, TUE, etc.)

title: API Refresh - Every ~15 seconds
custom_expected: https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?sportId=1&gamePk=531324&hydrate=team,linescore,flags,liveLookin,review,person,stats,probablePitcher,game(content(summary,media(epg)),tickets)&useLatestGames=true&language=en

title: Teams - Away team displayed on top
custom_steps: WHEN user views game cell on miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the AWAY team should always be featured on top

title: Teams - Home team displayed on bottom
custom_steps: WHEN user views game cell on miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the HOME team should always be featured on bottom

title: FINAL - Game data - All game states are displayed on the scoreboard
custom_preconds: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/proddev/MLB+Scoreboard+2017#MLBScoreboard2017-GameState,ChallengesandReview
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB
custom_expected: THEN depending on the game state, the specific game state should appear (Delayed, Suspended, Cancelled, etc.)

title: FINAL - Game data - If extra innings, show final inning
custom_preconds: GIVEN game has been completed in extra innings
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB for extra inning game in FINAL state
custom_expected: THEN the inning final text should read as F/[last inning] -- example F/11

title: FINAL - Teams - Losing team is greyed out
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is in final state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB with games in final state
custom_expected: THEN the losing team of a game should appear slightly greyed out

title: FINAL - Game Cell - game cell should get a grey shade background when game is FINAL
custom_preconds: GIVEN a game has gone to final
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB with games in final state
custom_expected: THEN a game cell that is in Final state should have a grey/darkened background

title: PREGAME - Game data - Game times are displayed in ET
custom_preconds: GIVEN games are in pregame state
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB on MiLB.com
custom_expected: THEN all game start time should appear in ET

title: LIVE & FINAL - Game data - Runs are displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN game is in Live or Final state
custom_steps: WHEN user views miniSB
custom_expected: THEN miniSB should show the score of the game for both teams in game cell

title: LIVE - Game data - Inning should read Top 6th /Bot 6th
custom_preconds: GIVEN in web viewports, load miniSB in Live game state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB
custom_expected: THEN Inning text during live game should read "Top 6th" or "BOT 6th"

title: LIVE - Game data - Challenge/Review text should appear next to inning text
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a game in a Challenge or Review state
custom_steps: WHEN user views the game cell that has a Challenge or Review state
custom_expected: THEN Challenge or Review text should appear next to the inning text

title: PPD - Original Game Date is "Final" - PPD: Makeup MM/DD
PPD - Makeup Date is "Preview" - Makeup of MM/DD - PPD
CAN - Original Game Date is "Final" - Cancelled
SUSP - Original Game Date "Suspended" - T/U status - SUSP (T6): Resumed on MM/DD - Keep inning indicator and add note
SUSP - Original Game Date "Completed" - O/T status - SUSP; Completed on MM/DD
SUSP - Resumed Date - "Suspended" - T/U status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD - Add score, inning indicator and note
SUSP - Resume Date - "Completed" - O/T status - Completion of suspended game on MM/DD
Sort Live > Preview > Final > PPD/SUSP/CANCELLED
custom_preconds: GIVEN games are in different game states
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB while games are in different game states
custom_expected:
THEN there should be an order to the sorting of games 

- Live > Preview > Final > PPD/SUSP/CANCELLED

title: All double headers should be sorted next to each other in Preview & Final game state (single ticket/split ticket)
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a double header game on the schedule
custom_steps: WHEN user loads the miniSB
custom_expected: THEN all double header games should be sorted next to each other (regardless on whether they are single ticket or split ticket)

title: Game 1 Live and Game 2 Preview - sort together
custom_preconds: GIVEN Game 1 of double header is live and Game 2 is in preview
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB and has a double header with Game 1 game Live and Game 2 is in Preview
custom_expected: THEN Game 1 and Game 2 should be sorted together

title: Game 1 Final and Game 2 in Preview/Warmup/Live - do not sort together
custom_preconds: GIVEN Game 1 of a double header is in Final state and Game 2 is in Preview/Warmup/Live state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB with GIVEN double header
custom_expected: THEN Game 1 and Game 2 should NOT be sorted together. Game 1 (Final) should be sorted with rest of games that are Final and Game 2 (not-final) should be sorted in usual (Preview/Live) spot.

title: Spring Training/Exhibition games should be sorted at beginning of miniSB
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are Spring Training or Exhibition games on the same day as Regular Season games
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB
custom_expected: THEN the Spring Training and Exhibition games should be sorted at the beginning of miniSB

title: Game 1 Final and Game 2 Final should be sorted together
custom_preconds: GIVEN Game 1 and Game 2 of double header are in Final game state
custom_steps: WHEN user loads miniSB with double headers in final state
custom_expected: THEN both Game 1 and Game 2 should be sorted together in Final section of miniSB
